topics.body:
"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a7c3df6368727f249d0100#post_53a7c3df6368727f249d0100
Not really; philosophically I'm partial towards discordianism or the belief that "there's many windows to look through reality though all of which only show a fraction of the picture" in this case these facebook comments only show a small picture of how the world is and doesn't show the whole picture.

Just cause that person doesn't know what a vice president is or such only shows a small truth that some people aren't educated into the workings of the usa government, not the whole picture on the state of the world though.

*Foams at the mouth and dies.  Seconds later, corpse transforms into a Kamen Rider*
